name: Gisselle Desirae Lugo

coverLetter: Hello, my name is Gisselle I am not a college graduate or have any prior experience working for the marijuana industry. I have been a user so I Gain my knowledge through my own experience. I know there is different types of marijuana Sativa, Indica and hybrid. I know al strains help different people in different ways stress, anxiety, sleep deprivation etc. I believe marijuana is great but should always be handled responsibly. I’m open minded therefore I strongly believe I would be a great candidate for consideration.
